column6: AVENGERS DISASSEMBLED TIE-IN! Ragnarok appears to have come for the gods of Asgard--but will Thor be their savior, or its architect? In search of new wisdom, the Thunder God must repeat the ordeals of Odin--and the price may be too terrible for even an immortal to pay!
column8: | penciller (cover):Steve Epting | writer:Mike Avon Oeming | colorist:Laura Villari | penciller:Andrea Di Vito
